import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Tab from './Tab' import './Header.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faBars, faTimes } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' function Header({activetab}) { const icons =[faBars, faTimes] const [iconIndex, setIconIndex] = useState(0) const handleMenu = () => { setIconIndex(Math.abs(iconIndex-1)) } const isSmallScreen = useMediaQuery({ query: '(max-device-width: 812px)' }) return (
) } export default Header
